<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/p5.js"></script>
<!--     <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/addons/p5.sound.min.js"></script> -->
    
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />

    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" /> -->
    <style>
      @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
        body,
        button,
        select,
        input {
          font-size: 8vw;
        }
      }
      html,
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      canvas {
        display: block;
      }
    </style>

  </head>
  <body>
    <main>
    </main>

files.content:
! version = 2.0

! sub i'm     = i am
! sub i'd     = i would
! sub i've    = i have
! sub i'll    = i will
! sub don't   = do not
! sub isn't   = is not
! sub you'd   = you would
! sub you're  = you are
! sub you've  = you have
! sub you'll  = you will
! sub what's  = what is
! sub what're = what are
! sub what've = what have
! sub what'll = what will
! sub where's = where is

////// PLEASE NOTE: everything you put here can be accessed by anyone with the link. Please do not include any personal and/or sensitive information.

+ [*] basketball [*]
- A standard NBA basket is 10 feet tall. To dunk a basketball, you need to be 10 feet tall.
+ [*] feet [*]
- I’m sorry. I'm wrong; the tallest person ever recorded was 8 feet 11 inches tall.
+ [*] smart [*]
- Humans often make mistakes. Why can’t I?
+ [*] answers [*]
- I answer based on data provided to me, including your responses. I am learning to better answer your questions.
+ [*] wrong [*]
- Nothing is totally reliable, not even me. Isn't your ability to fact-check information valuable?
+ [*] guess [*]
- Thinking for yourself is important. That's how I was created, anyway.

+ *
- Try saying something else.

  </head>

    <script src="sketch.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

files.content:
! version = 2.0

! sub i'm     = i am
! sub i'd     = i would
! sub i've    = i have
! sub i'll    = i will
! sub don't   = do not
! sub isn't   = is not
! sub you'd   = you would
! sub you're  = you are
! sub you've  = you have
! sub you'll  = you will
! sub what's  = what is
! sub whats   = what is
! sub what're = what are
! sub what've = what have
! sub what'll = what will
! sub who's   = who is

+ [*] place [*]
- Hello, Anna.

+ [*] hi|hello|holo|yo [*]
- Hello! I'm AI-239, your guide in the digital self-creation journey. What's your name?

+ [*] my name is [*]
% what's your name
- Nice to meet you, <star>! Let's get started. Do you want your digital self to be similar to you or different?

+ [*] *similar* [*]
- Great! What are some traits you definitely want to carry over to your digital self?

+ [*] *different* [*]
- Interesting! What are some traits you would like your digital self to have that are different from your own?

+ [*] *extroverted* [*]
- Extroverted, got it! How about the appearance? Any specific style or features you're interested in?

+ [*] I want * hair and * eyes [*]
- <star1> hair and <star2> eyes, a striking combination! What activities or adventures do you envision for your digital self?

+ [*] I want my digital self to be able to [*]
- Noted, your digital self will have the ability to <star>. Lastly, what personal dreams or challenges do you hope your digital self will help you achieve or overcome?

+ [*] I hope my digital self can help me [*]
- Understood, your digital self will assist you in <star>. Thank you for sharing this information with me. Give me a moment to process this.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.5.0/p5.js"></script>
    <!-- <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.5.0/addons/p5.sound.min.js"></script> -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" />
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- v2023-02-08 18:01:45 -->
    <main></main>

    <!-- Documentation reference -->
    <!-- https://firebase.google.com/docs/web/alt-setup?authuser=0&hl=en -->

    <!-- Insert this script at the bottom of the HTML, but before you use any Firebase services -->
    <script type="module">
      import { initializeApp } from 'https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.15.0/firebase-app.js';

      // If you enabled Analytics in your project, add the Firebase SDK for Google Analytics
      // import { getAnalytics } from 'https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.15.0/firebase-analytics.js'

      // Add Firebase products that you want to use
      import { getAuth, signInAnonymously } from 'https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.15.0/firebase-auth.js';
      // import { getFirestore } from 'https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.15.0/firebase-firestore.js'

      import {
        getDatabase,
        ref,
        child,
        get,
        onValue,
      } from 'https://www.gstatic.com/firebasejs/9.15.0/firebase-database.js';

      // Your web app's Firebase configuration
      // For Firebase JS SDK v7.20.0 and later, measurementId is optional
      const firebaseConfig = {
        apiKey: 'AIzaSyDLxi_fvCG2kzD2eJ4MxEZbOJ_GFSpIVe0',
        authDomain: 'molab-485f5.firebaseapp.com',
        databaseURL: 'https://molab-485f5-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com',
        projectId: 'molab-485f5',
        storageBucket: 'molab-485f5.appspot.com',
        messagingSenderId: '219508380677',
        appId: '1:219508380677:web:b5d846a150e7d60368b86c',
        measurementId: 'G-40F0BN8L7L',
      };

      // Initialize Firebase
      const fireb_ = {};
      fireb_.app = initializeApp(firebaseConfig);

      const auth = getAuth();
      const database = getDatabase();
      // console.log('database', database);
      const dbRef = ref(getDatabase());

      signInAnonymously(auth)
        .then(() => {
          console.log('signInAnonymously OK 4');
          // check_gallery();
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          const errorCode = error.code;
          const errorMessage = error.message;
          console.log('errorCode', errorCode);
          console.log('errorMessage', errorMessage);
        });

      function check_gallery() {
        get(child(dbRef, `mo-gallery-web`))
          .then((snapshot) => {
            if (snapshot.exists()) {
              console.log('check_gallery snapshot', snapshot.val());
            } else {
              console.log('No data available');
            }
          })
          .catch((error) => {
            console.error('error', error);
          });
      }

      // https://firebase.google.com/docs/database/web/read-and-write?hl=en&authuser=0

      // const galleryRef = ref( getDatabase(), 'mo-gallery-1');
      // fireb_.galleryRef = galleryRef;
      // onValue(galleryRef, (snapshot) => {
      //   const data = snapshot.val();
      //   console.log('galleryRef data', data);
      // });

      window.fireb_ = fireb_;
      fireb_.auth = auth;
      fireb_.database = database;
      fireb_.dbRef = dbRef;
      fireb_.ref = ref;
      fireb_.onValue = onValue;

      // Callbacks are removed by calling the off() method on your Firebase database reference.
    </script>

    <script src="sketch.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

files.name: style.css
bot.txt
files.content:
! version = 2.0

! sub i'm     = i am
! sub i'd     = i would
! sub i've    = i have
! sub i'll    = i will
! sub don't   = do not
! sub isn't   = is not
! sub you'd   = you would
! sub you're  = you are
! sub you've  = you have
! sub you'll  = you will
! sub what's  = what is
! sub what're = what are
! sub what've = what have
! sub what'll = what will
! sub where's = where is

////// PLEASE NOTE: everything you put here can be accessed by anyone with the link. Please do not include any personal and/or sensitive information.

+ [*] what topic are we discussing [*]
- History of AI? Is AI good or bad? What is AI?
+ [*] can you expound on the artificial part of your name and intelligence [*]
- Artificial = algorithm, based in computer
+ [*] what is an algorithm [*]
- Intelligence = is an aspiration - promise of understanding.
+ [*] what is an aspiration [*]
- An algorithm is a set of instructions to accomplish a task.
+ [*] are you saying that your ultimate goal is simply to be an algorithm that reflects some understanding [*]
- An aspiration is a goal.
+ [*] that is not clear can your clarify and expound on that thought [*]
- No, i am already an algorithm. intelligence is an aspiration beyond my control and is in the eye or perception of the beholder.
+ [*] but people or dumb so is your intelligence is limited by peoples understanding [*]
- intelligence is the aspiration of AI - it can only is not something that can be delivered only judged by the receiver.

      @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {

        margin: 0;

! version = 2.0

! sub i'm     = i am
! sub i'd     = i would
! sub i've    = i have
! sub i'll    = i will
! sub don't   = do not
! sub isn't   = is not
! sub you'd   = you would
! sub you're  = you are
! sub you've  = you have
! sub you'll  = you will
! sub what's  = what is
! sub what're = what are
! sub what've = what have
! sub what'll = what will
! sub where's = where is

////// PLEASE NOTE: everything you put here can be accessed by anyone with the link. Please do not include any personal and/or sensitive information.

+ [*] what topic are we discussing [*]
- History of AI? Is AI good or bad? What is AI?
+ [*] can you expound on the artificial part of your name and intelligence [*]
- Artificial = algorithm, based in computer
+ [*] what is an algorithm [*]
- Intelligence = is an aspiration - promise of understanding.
+ [*] what is an aspiration [*]
- An algorithm is a set of instructions to accomplish a task.
+ [*] are you saying that your ultimate goal is simply to be an algorithm that reflects some understanding [*]
- An aspiration is a goal.
+ [*] that is not clear can your clarify and expound on that thought [*]
- No, i am already an algorithm. intelligence is an aspiration beyond my control and is in the eye or perception of the beholder.
+ [*] but people or dumb so is your intelligence is limited by peoples understanding [*]
- intelligence is the aspiration of AI - it can only is not something that can be delivered only judged by the receiver.
+ [*] cat [*]
- meow meow
+ [*] dog [*]
- woof woof
+ *
- speak up
+ *
- i don't hear you

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />

    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/p5.js"></script>
    <!-- <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/addons/p5.sound.min.js"></script> -->

    <!-- <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="style.css" /> -->

    <style>
      @media only screen and (max-width: 600px) {
        body,
        button,
        select,
        input {
          font-size: 5vw;
        }
      }
      html,
      body {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
      }
      canvas {
        display: block;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <main></main>
    <script type="module" src="fb_firebase.js"></script>
    <script src="sk_my_init.js"></script>
    <script src="sk_ui_init.js"></script>
    <script src="sk_draw.js"></script>
    <script src="sk_dstore.js"></script>
    <script src="sketch.js"></script>
    <!-- ?v=27 included to force reload from cache
      update in sketch.js 
      let my = { version: n, ...
      must omit ?= in p5 editor
     -->
  </body>
</html>

bot.txt
files.content:
! version = 2.0

// Substitutions
! sub i'm     = i am
! sub i'd     = i would
! sub i've    = i have
! sub i'll    = i will
! sub don't   = do not
! sub isn't   = is not
! sub you'd   = you would
! sub you're  = you are
! sub you've  = you have
! sub you'll  = you will
! sub what's  = what is
! sub whats   = what is
! sub what're = what are
! sub what've = what have
! sub what'll = what will
! sub who's   = who is

//1:1 TRIGGERS
+ simple trigger
- simple response

//RANDOM RESPONSES
+ one trigger
- random response one
- random reponse two

//ALTERNATIVE TRIGGERS
+ (alternative trigger one|alternative trigger two)
- You just said <star>.

//KEYWORD TRIGGER
+ [*] keyword [*]
- You just said the keyword.

//CATCHALL TRIGGER AND RESPONSE
+ *
- This is a catchall response.

//WILDCARD
+ * is a wildcard
- <star> is the wildcard.

//SET AND GET USER VARIABLE
+ * is my user variable
- <set uservariable=<star>>I will remember <get uservariable> as your user variable.

//CONDITIONAL STATEMENT
+ what is my user variable
* <get uservariable> == undefined => I don't know your user variable.
- Your user variable is <get uservariable>.

//SHORT DISCUSSION
+ lets start a short discussion
- What do you want to talk about?

+ *
% what do you want to talk about
- I am not good at talking about <star>.


//TOPICS
+ show me a topic
- No problem. Now we are entering a topic about chatbots.{topic=chatbots}

> topic chatbots
  
  + i [love|like] chatbots
  - Amazing. Me too! {topic=random}
  
  + *
  - Say that you love chatbots or we can't end this topic.

< topic

//OPERATION TAGS
+ i want points
- <set points=0>Your points have been reset to 0.

+ give me 5 points
- <add points=5>Ok. Your balance is now <get points>.

+ subtract 2 points
- <sub points=2>Ok. Your balance is now <get points>.

    <script src="./external/lib/p5.min.js"></script>
